mapper.update: update activity_gold_egg set activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_egg_amount = #{gold_egg_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gold_egg_settlement_amount = #{gold_egg_settlement_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gold_egg_type = #{gold_egg_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_ids = #{supplier_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, gold_egg_remark = #{gold_egg_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where activity_gold_egg_id = #{activity_gold_egg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select activity_gold_egg_id, activity_id, gold_egg_amount, gold_egg_settlement_amount, gold_egg_type, supplier_ids, gold_egg_remark from activity_gold_egg where activity_gold_egg_id = #{activity_gold_egg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select activity_gold_egg_id, activity_id, gold_egg_amount, gold_egg_settlement_amount, gold_egg_type, supplier_ids, gold_egg_remark from activity_gold_egg
